member.name: P:Sharpmake.Durango.GlobalSettings.IgnoreMissingXdkEditionTargetPath
member.summary: Ignore when the path for the XdkTargetEdition is missing. In the TG we do a SDK Switch (which creates a symlink to the SDK needed) before building but after generation so it's possible that the path does not exist during generation

member.name: F:Sharpmake.Durango.GlobalSettings.s_xdkEditionTarget
member.summary: Xdk Edition Target Build project against a specific XDK Edition. Do not set to build against the XDK with the highest version

member.name: F:Sharpmake.Durango.GlobalSettings._feb2018XdkEditionTarget
member.summary: EnableLegacyXdkHeaders to use VS2015 include and libraries on VS2017.

members.member: Those methods apply to what's *installed* on the machine Warning: those are not necessarily the ones used by your projects
Those methods will check the XDK in use
